import redis
r = redis.Redis(host=''localhost'', port=6379, db=0)
print(''Redis queue length before:'', r.llen(''celery''))
r.delete(''celery'')  # Clear the queue
print(''Redis queue length after:'', r.llen(''celery''))
print(''Queue cleared!'')
")
